RedisKit

RedisLib Development Guidelines

Build, Lint, and Test Commands

  • Build: dotnet build
  • Lint: dotnet format (if available)
  • Test all: dotnet test
  • Test single: dotnet test --filter "MethodName"

Code Style Guidelines

  • Use C# 12+ features and .NET 9 conventions
  • Follow Microsoft's official C# coding guidelines
  • Use var for local variables when type is obvious
  • Prefer async/await over callbacks
  • Use MessagePack for serialization
  • Use StackExchange.Redis for Redis operations
  • All services implement interface contracts from Interfaces/
  • Logging uses source generator with EventId support
  • Error handling follows the pattern: try/catch, log error and rethrow with throw;
  • Use nullable reference types (Nullable enabled)
  • Use ArgumentNullException, ArgumentException for parameter validation
  • Method parameters should be validated at method entry

Naming Conventions

  • PascalCase for types, methods and properties
  • camelCase for local variables and parameters
  • Prefix interfaces with 'I' (e.g., ICacheService)
  • Use descriptive names for methods and variables
